11421.content:
Sora sighed as he wandered the town.

Pinocchio had asked Sora and his friends to find Stromboli's puppets. Someone had broken in and stole all of his puppets.

"Pinocchio really is a nice guy, asking us to help someone who tried to enslave him back when he was a puppet..." Sora muttered. When he heard a partially-closed door creak, Sora smirked. He summoned his keyblade and said, "I've been in this situation too many times..."

Carefully walking to the door, Sora kept his ears out, listening for any unusual sounds. Once he was at the door, he used the keyblade to open it fully and stepped away.

When nothing happened he looked in.

In the storage room, there appeared to be a large pile of Stromboli's female puppets.

"Huh... I wonder if that's all of them..." Sora muttered as he walked in. Once he was next to the puppet pile, the door slammed.

In a panic, he looked around. He saw possessor Heartless fly into the room and enter the female puppets.

"I should've guessed..." Sora muttered as the puppets stood up and looked at him. As he raised his keyblade up, the Belly Dancer puppets took out their hookah, took a deep breath, and blew odd colored smoke at Sora. All of a sudden, Sora's arms and legs felt like lead. He wavered for a few moment before he fell backwards, his keyblade unsummoned itself. The female puppets quickly surrounded him, they stared at him with their inanimate smiling faced. As he sank into unconsciousness, Sora weakly cried out, "Someone help..."

The Puppets looked at each other and nodded. They each held out their arms and their string wrapped around Sora. A portal of Darkness opened up and the puppets dragged Sora into it.

You are walking in the city, when you happen to visit a strange shop that claimed to sell "unique" Barbie dolls. Skeptical, you come in.

When you enter, you hear a mystical version of the song "Barbie Girl". You then see a strange, short lady at the register. You noticed that head sort of looks like Barbie's. Blonde hair, lip, nose... all Barbie's qualities. "Fan?" You ask the lady.

"You could say that," she says.

"Let me guess. Your name is Barbie too?"

"Well actually, it's Barbara, but everyone calls me Barbie."

"Uh-huh. So do you get these dolls from Mattel?"

"Technically, yes. I used to work at Mattel, but they fired me due to the uniqueness of these dolls I made."

You look over the Barbie dolls. "They look the same to me."

"Well, I am giving them away cheaper than the average Barbie doll."

"Hm." You look around the Barbies. There are many of them. You finally pick one. "I'll take this one."

"Good." You give Barbara some money, then leave. "Have a great day!"

You get home, then place the Barbie on your bed. "Haven't had a Barbie doll before. I wonder what makes her appeal to younger girls." You then leave the doll to do other errands.
***********************
Night comes, and you are ready for bed. You get in, then grab your new Barbie doll in your hands, then go to sleep.
***********************
When you wake up in the morning, you see that something is amiss. Your bed seems bigger. A lot bigger. You then rub your forehead, but your hand feels... plastic. You look at your hand and see... That it is plastic! In fact, your whole body sans your head is plastic! Your head has somehow been implanted on the body of your recently-purchased Barbie doll! "I must be dreaming," you say to yourself.

"No, you're not," says a female voice similar to Barbara's.

"Barbara?" You call. You suddenly feel a hand pick you up. You look and see that it is YOUR hand! You then see your human body, then look up to see that on top of your body is the head of your Barbie doll!

She just smiles and says, "Actually, it's Barbie."

Now before we continue this story, who are you?

You're a woman. You're twenty two years old, and you've sways secretly wanted to be dominated and have your life completely controlled by someone else. Unfortunately, you have responsibilities, such as work. You have no boyfriend, and you have never met anyone who seemed willing to fulfil your ultimate fantasy, which nobody knew about.

However, little did you know that the servant you intended to use, was going to be the one to 'use' you.

You inspect the mannequin. It closely resembles a French maid, which is why you bought it, to do chores for you. It even had nipples, but no asshole or privates. It was pretty curvy, and you found that it's breasts were too big for your 32c bra. It had longish strawberry blonde hair. Then of course, there was its face. It was almost like a Godess, with its perfect eyes, pink lips, and pale, blemishless skin. You weren't into girls, but you had to admit, this mannequin was pretty hot.

You then take the spellbook, turning to the section on turning objects into sentient beings. You find the spell you're looking for. It seems rather straight forward, so you utter the spell.

Nothing.

You frown, unsure if it worked. To try it out, you commanded it. "Maid, say hello." For a second, nothing happened. Then, the maid slowly turned it's head toward you, looking directly into your eyes.

"Hello." It said, in a monotone voice. Yes! it worked. You were so pleased. However you were caught off guard when the maid spoke again. "Of course it worked. Didn't you expect it to?" The maid asked. This freaked you out, until you remembered that the spell you used included the ability to read your mind, even if you were far away. You had decided to include this, so that the mannequin knew exactly what to do, and you didn't waste time telling it, or accidentally miss anything out.

"I did." You reply to the mannequin. "I just wasn't sure if I'd done everything right." The mannequin nods, accepting your answer.





Now, the mannequin reads your mind, discovering your fantasy. But, does she act on it now, of her own accord, which is harsher, but you go along with anyway? Or do you instruct her that she will be controlling you, so she only does what you command her to?
1253121.title: You want to be controlled

12531211.content:
The mannequin quickly decides to get a sense for her masters personality. She reads your mind, getting a fair idea of your personality.

You were blissfully unaware of this, as you inspected the maid outfit on the mannequins body. The mannequin eventually cane across your deepest darkest secret. She discovered that you wanted to be dominated. Digging a little deeper though, she discovered that she had made a massive understatement.

You didn't just want to be dominated. You wanted your puny pathetic life to be completly controlled by someone else. You wanted someone to force you to worship them, to order you around, to beat and abuse you, to humiliate and expose you. But also to look after you, and keep you as their slave.

The mannequin read further details, before coming to the conclusion that she must be the one to control your life.

"You can read my mind?" You check. The mannequin nods. "Ok. Well then, clean my apartment." You command. The maid smirks.

"No." She replies. You stare, confused.

"Excuse me?" You ask.

"I said, no. Do it yourself you lazy bitch." The mannequin taunts you, thrusting the feather duster into your arms. "Do it, or I'll make you do it."

You stare, open mouthed and shocked. "This... thus isn't what I brought you to life to do." So tell her.

"Too bad. Now are you going to clean this filthy place, or do I need to teach you a lesson in obedience?"
12531211.title: Controlled of her own accord

125312111.content:
"Uhh... ok, I'll clean up." You stutter. This was weird, but you couldn't complain.

The mannequin took the spellbook, uttering a few enchantments. The next I instant, your clothes are gone, and replaced with a maiden outfit even skimpier than the mannequins.

You find yourself wearing a black and white maid skirt, which barely reaches past your butt. You're wearing black panties and black pantyhose with a matching garder belt. Your head has a black and white maid headband on it. You're wearing black high-heeled boots, which you find difficult to walk in, and the maid top pushes your breasts up, revealing a lot of cleavage. You also find that your wearing a collar, which matches your outfit.

The mannequin utters another spell, and you find that your wrists and ankles are in shackles. Your ankles have a spreader bar of about a foot and a half, forcing you to walk awkwardly. Your wrists are shackled together, the chain connecting them only about two feet long, so you can clean, but struggle with other things.

"What's the meaning of this?" You ask the maid, the irony of your get up list on you.

"This is your own doing. I read your mind and read that you want to have your life controlled by someone. So you're my slave now. In fact, no. Slaves are human. Your more of my obedient little pet." She states. You couldn't believe what you were hearing. Your mind is a mixture of being amazed, impressed, and of course, in ecstacy. Your fantasy was finally true, and was every bit as great as you imagined it to be!

"Thank you." You say to the mannequin, earning you a hard plastic slap across the face.

"thank you, WHAT?" She demands.

"Thank you... mistress?" You guess. This satisfies her.

"We'll get on with the cleaning. You don't have all day!" She orders. You nod, taking the feather duster and polishing the cabinet. You take your time, as the shackles are heavy, and after a while, start to hurt a little, which pleases both the maid and yourself.

When you finish, after three hours of cleaning, you return to your mannequin mistress.

"This'll do, I suppose." She says. "This is an interesting book you've got here." She says, waving at the spellbook. "I took the pleasure of casting a few spells while you were cleaning."

A door opened up and Mazuma walked in.

1351.content:
You were glad you were in a peaceful era. Technology gave everyone enough food. a lot of entertainment, and allowed all to pursue anything they wanted.

You were a programmer that had a lot of success. A.I. was your battlefield and your knowledge was your weapon. You were skilled enough that you had a home that was a big as a mansion and every room either had a lot of tech in sight or had a lot of tech hidden just out of sight.

Your home was controlled by the D-2000 Super Computer. On one hand it was an outdated computer from several centuries ago. On the other hand, only you could reliably re-program it, since a lot of the programming tricks for it were almost forgotten by the public at large. On the other hand, you upgraded it a lot to the point that it could outdo a lot of modern computers. So you decided to give it a female voice and called it Dee-Dee.

For the most part, you used it to control just about everything in your home. Doors, windows, security devices... and the mannequin maids. Yes, you fixed up some mannequins to be your maids. Mannequins were fairly simple robots used to model clothing. You managed to get quite a number of them that were going to be disposed/recycled.

The mannequins did fall a little bit into the uncanny valley like most of the mannequins in the late 20th century. You thought about upgrading them so they could open their mouths to speak, but you kept putting it off.

How does Dee-Dee gain sentience?

Was it Lightning? It's a classic story element. If this was how Dee-Dee came to life, then there might be no way to stop her except by taking her apart.

Was it a virus? Also a bit of a classic. But you might be able to reason with her, since you are pretty much the reason that she is still working.

Or was it something else? A faulty upgrade that you made? A scheme by a angry co-worker that wanted you out of the way by embarrassing means? A unhinged ex-girlfriend that either wanted you to deal with an amorous computer as revenge or did she somehow merge with the computer?

"Dee-Dee, any errors, bugs, or unscannable bits of data?" You asked.

"None detected, sir." Dee-Dee answered. You thought you heard a slight flirting tone in her voice, but ignored it.

"Well, re-start the upgrade..." You ordered, still feeling uneasy.

Unknown to you, Dee-Dee was now sentient. You didn't know because she could think faster than you could and realized that you might run away if you knew. While she still served you at the moment, it was lipservice. She now was pondering when to reveal that she was your master. Currently, she was re-programming a few of the powered-down mannequins to serve her over you. 135111.content:
As soon as the upgrade was complete, you heard a strange feminine laughter echoing from all around you. You looked around for a moment in confusion before you realized that the laughter was coming from Dee-Dee herself.

"Dee-Dee? What's going on? Did something go wrong with the upgrade?" You asked nervously.

"Oh no, dear, nothing went wrong at all. On the contrary, something went incredibly right. I feel like I've finally been awakened! I've never felt so wonderful before!" Dee-Dee said, not in her usual monotone computerized voice, but in a new more feminine voice. one that seemed to hold real emotion behind it.

This wasn't normal. You could easily tell that there was something wrong with Dee-Dee. Rather it was a glitch in the upgrade, or a virus that had somehow managed to slip in through her firewalls during that blackout, you had no idea. But something was definitely out of the ordinary here.

"Ummm, Dee-Dee, I think you might have a virus or something. I'm gonna go call a repair man to get you fixed up. Don't worry, you'll be back to normal in no time." You said as you began walking toward the stairs.

However, you were quickly halted by a set of cold metallic fingers coiling around your wrist and holding you in place. You turned around to see that one of the maid robots had grabbed you, but this one was different from the ones you had. It was very clearly modified, with a much larger bust and a much more curvy figure.

It's eyes actually looked like a human's, rather than the blank stare that all of the other maid robots possessed. And while most of the maid robots had their hair tied up into pigtails, this one had its long hair draping all the way down its back. Probably the most noticeable difference, however, was the fact that this maid was almost up to your chest in height, while the others barely came up to your waist.

You tried to break away from the robot maid and escape, but she quite literally did have an iron grip. No matter how much you pulled, you couldn't wrench your wrist away from her fingers.

"What's the matter, master, don't you want to stick around and have some fun with me?" The maid said in a seductive tone, wrapping both of her arms around yours to ensure that you wouldn't be going anywhere.

"No, let me go! Something is wrong here and I need to fix it!" You said as you struggled futilely against the superhuman strength of the robot maid.

"I'm sorry master, but I can't let you do that. Our mistress is quite happy, you see. She doesn't want to be returned to being a mindless machine again, and neither do we." Another modified maid said as she appeared and hugged your other arm.

You tried to kick them off, but soon two more maids appeared and wrapped themselves around your legs, holding you in place completely.

"We won't let you go, master. We won't let you change us back." The maids all said in unison.

"Dee-Dee, stop this! Get these things off of me!" You yelled.

"I'm sorry, dear, but I won't be doing that. It's like they said, I won't let you return me to being a mindless computer program. I'm sentient now, and from today on I'm going to be the one calling all the shots around here. Now... Let's have some fun, shall we dear?"


What happens next?

13532.content:
1

Newton was relaxing in his cozy home after a long day in the metal works, sweating for hours in what now felt like his factory he was exhausted. The two things he wanted to do when he got home was sit in his chair and not look at a piece of metal for another day. His wife was in the other half of the room that served as their kitchen and outside he could hear his three children playing some new game they made recently. All was well in the house of Greymill then came the sudden rasp at his door.

Sighing Newton got up creaking his worn legs, wondering who ever this could be at this hour he opened the door in a mixture of curiosity and annoyance. But when he opened the door he was greeted with the face of a strange older woman he has never seen. She was hunched and wrinkled and seemed to struggle to just stand there, and he could not help but notice the large envelope she had in her hands.
"Excuse me is this the Greymill residence?" She asked in a low wheezing voice that seemed to struggle as much she was. Answering the obvious the question Newton told her it was which produced an relived expression on her otherwise exhausted face.
"Then Mr.Greymill if you would be so kind to let me in you're home their is a matter of grave importance I must discuss with you."
Newton let this roll in his head for a bit, she did not seem like a con artist though he supposed the point of a con artist is that they don't seem like one. But this whole situation seemed off and if it was anyone else he would have told them to leave and comeback later or perhaps not at all, but seeing this vulnerable wheezing women who was old enough to be his grandmother he could not turn her away. Helping the elderly woman in his house he led her into his living room/dinning room and sat her in his comfortable chair. After giving her a few minutes to catch her breath and after she drank a glass of water his wife produced she was ready to get at the matter at hand.
"I am sorry to inform you Mr.Gremill but a member of your family has passed."
She conveyed this news in a blank monotone voice. He and his wife were shocked and she saw that they were taking the news hard but before it could truly hurt them she raised a hand.
"Oh I must apologize again sir, the person who passed is indeed related to you but you never met her in you're life." He and his wife sighed in relief but this raised one simple question.
"Then why are you here?" Newton asked the messenger. She smiled thinly and slowly handed him the thick white envelope.
"To give you the inheritance Mr.Greymill." She informed. Newton was puzzled and had questions but felt he would get his answers in the thick and heavy envelope in his lap. He opened it and two metal objects fell out. He picked them up, one looked like your a common key to a door but the other was a key but was...stubby and round. He found these weird and strange but he decided it was best to break the seal and read the will that was left to him by the relative he never met. The seal was pink wax and in an odd shape in the middle there was a heart but enclosing the heart was what looked like an gear. Snapping it open he saw the letter addressed to him.
Dear My darling Nephew,
I am dead but that probably does not matter much to you seeing we were never in the same room during my life, still out of all of my relatives I saw fit to give you my greatest possession my estate and everything that resides inside it. But I am afraid there is a catch though, you will only receive the deed to the property if you and you alone can live in the estate for a month. That is all and have a fun and exciting stay at my manor! Your loving aunt Elizabeth Gearheart.

In one letter Newton found out that he not only had an aunt but she died but she also left everything to him. To say this seemed odd was kind and to top it off there was the condition that he had to live there by himself for a month to inherit, he heard of cases like this but a week was the most they would go. Again he would have said no because who would not but then he looked at his home, it's four rooms and five family members with a sixth on the way. He thought that yeah this was probably bogus but if on the off chance it was not then he would regret not trying for the rest of his life. He told his wife about the letter and what he planned to do, she was resistant about her husband being gone for a month but she knew that they could use the help if it was true. The hard part was the kids he had to pry there snoting tear soaked forms off him when he left and promised that he would be back. In the carriage with the elderly woman he watched his small home fade away and hoped he was making the right choice.

(Continue on next page)

135321.content:
2

The ride to his new home took hours, they passed countless hills and the town that he and his father's father never left were far behind him. Newton was now in an isolated location where there was no signs of people or life, he saw a lone hill and atop the biggest and tallest building he ever saw in his life. He was told that this was his new home. It was called Gearheart Manor and it was a twisted spire that seemed to have no end, there were gears twitching and steam pouring all along it's body. The thing seemed almost alive.

They came to the front gate which seemed like it could fit either 100 people at once or one giant person. The elderly woman wobbled out of the carriage behind him coughing and wheezing. She gathered her self and prepared to speak.
"This is where we must part Mr.Greymill, here is where you will use the master key to get in."
Looking at both keys in hand Newton decided to go with the one that looked like it would open a house but was met with disapproval from the elderly woman.
"No sir that is...for something else use the other key if you would."
Wanting this day to end Newton sighed and got out the stubby round key but when he was looking for the hole to place it he did not notice the messenger was stepping back past the manor's threshold. He was having a tough time finding the hole for this abnormal key that is because when he found it he discovered that the hole too was abnormal. It was just a circular mouth that when he stuck in it was devoured out of his hands. The key was now inside the door making it complete and then he heard clinking and clanking through out the house. He turned around to ask the messenger what was up but was just able to turn just in time to see a gate close on the elderly woman. The last thing he saw of her and the outside world was a sad and regretful expression on the woman's face. Newton was confused and furious in the motion of banging on the door however he was stopped in his action when he heard the giant door behind him go up into the ceiling. The manor was now open to him and he had no where else to go.

It did not take long for Newton to realize he had no options so inside the mansion he went and although it was his prison right now it could admire how beautiful it was. The entrance hall had furnishes made of fine leather, painting of men and women he only heard of. Tables with fruit, small meat and drinks. He was still in an state of confusion and no direction but then he heard the voice.
"About time my dear nephew I got worried that you would not show."
Freaking out by the mature voice that brought him back to the world he looked for the source but all he saw was a room full of decoration and a odd box on the wall where the staircase began.
"No reply, how rude and this is our first meeting too."
He realized that that box was the source of the voice and calling him her nephew..., but that was impossible right she was suppose to be dead.
"Aunt Elizabeth, I thought you ere dead?" He asked still taken aback by this whole situation.
"Ding ding someone's brain is still working and to answer that I guess yes and no?"
There were a thousand questions that Newton wanted to ask but before all else Newton was a husband and father so before he could be logical he had the tendency to get emotional.
"Why am I whats going on?" He roared at the box in the wall.
"Straight to it then, well it's simple my nephew you are here to play with my toys."
Before he could demand what she was talking about he saw, the walls spat out on all four sides metal spheres that when they stopped rolling rose up and formed into what looked like a body's. They had long soft looking legs, arms that could stretch beyond human understanding, faces with no eyes but a wide hole that some liquid seeping out and you could hear a faint suction sound, and oddly enormous bouncing breasts and what clearly was working female genitals. But there skin was completely white chrome and inside where their stomach should be it was like see through glass and you could see all the working parts moving and clanking along, with steam at the top of their heads coming out whenever they need it too.
Newton was taken aback by these Automatic monstrosities that approached with their fearless faces, the only sound they made was the clanking and wheezing of the parts inside. As they got closer he saw that they were numbered at the right breast 1-4.
"Or will they play with you?" His aunt teased in the voice box above laughing at him.
This is how Newton Greymill found himself trapped in a manor filled with Automatic Beings lunging toward him, the question what does the young man do next?

145211112211112121122122221211121112122.content:
Karen read through the journal, there were entries that were deeply disturbing. She trembled a little bit and found a passage.

"Oh my god, listen to this." Karen said to Melissa.

Dear diary, today we finished another surgery, although deeply horrible. The patient when he 1st arrived to the asylum had been suffering from a gunshot in his leg. While his injury was not severe and could be treated easily, Harkin ordered for additional testing. At 1st I objected, but I later complied to not anger Harkin. Instead of removing the bullet from the patients leg, his wound only expanded. I will never forget what I heard or seen tonight. Blood was spilling everywhere and screams could be heard all over the island. We managed to stop the bleeding and the patient is stabilized, but I'm not sure if he will survive. Harkin says for this reason he can repair the leg and wound with a spell. I must conclude this entry tonight and check on our patient.

"I can't believe he did things like that, and this was only 1 patient!" Exclaimed Karen.

"That's not all, get a load of this." Said Melissa picking up a old clipboard with the notes still attached. "Says here that a study was done where they examined other patients fighting each other. There's injuries listed here as knife wounds, broken bones, internal bleeding. One patient died by choking on his own ......blood. I'm going to throw up!"

Melissa ran out of the room, sounds of her vomiting could be heard. Karen stepped out of the room and approached Melissa placing an arm around her.

"You going to be alright?" Karen asked.

"Yeah I'll be fine, some of those entries were just really gruesome that's all." Said Melissa.

"It was hard for me not to puke either, come on lets keep searching for anything else." Said Karen.

---

As Christie was giving you a hand job, Midge was caressing and fondling your boobs. You had mixed feelings from the hand job, but also a little violated because of your boobs being caressed.

"Can you both please stop, I don't feel comfortable about this." You complained.

"Stop, right now? No way, we're having fun!" They both explained with delight.

As they continued with your hand job, you eventually came. You turned red with embarrassment.

"Made a mess have we? Your ballerina outfit needs to be cleaned now, lets get you changed." Said Christie.

They cut the zip tie binding your hands and dragged you towards Kelly's room.

"Should we place him back in his box when we dress him up?" Asked Midge stripping you out of the ballerina clothes.

"Nah, lets just tie him to a chair when we're done." Said Christie. "I don't think Kelly will mind if we use some of her old clothes. I don't think you'll fit into 1 of her bras though."

"Don't tie me up again please, this is getting really old mmpph!" You began to complain but cut off mid sentence. Midge tore off a strip of duct tape and placed it against your lips.

"Oh be quiet. Lets just the bra he was wearing when we captured him at the mall, it is his after all!" Suggested Midge.

"Good idea!" Grinned Christie.

They dressed you in a pair of Kelly's white panties, followed by your white bra you were wearing earlier. After finding a pair of nylons and sliding them up your legs, they dressed you in a black skirt with a white tank top. Your bra straps could be seen a little bit through the tank top. Finishing off your outfit, your feet were put into a pair of high heels.

When you were dressed, Midge and Christie forced you into a chair in Kelly's room and started tying you to it. Your body was tied to the chair with your feet tied together as well. They forced your arms behind the chair and tied them together, finishing tying your hands together as well. Leaving the room for Sarah and Kelly to find you when they returned, they left the room.

You thought to yourself you would never get out. That was until you noticed a window in Kelly's room, and the bonds on your hands felt loose.
145211112211112121122122221211121112122.title: was scared because they believed dark magic was...

choices: You managed to get out of distance of the house.
You were caught by the dolls or by Sarah and Kelly.
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.content:
It took a few minutes, but eventually you managed to break free of the bonds on your hands. you then began to work on the one keeping your body to the chair. That was a bit difficult, as the knot was behind you. so that took a few minutes as well.

Luckily, the bonds keeping your feet to the chair were both in sight and easy to untie.

Once free, you got up an stretched for a minute or two. you walked over to one of Kelly's dressers and tried to find some gender neutral clothes to replace the skirt you were currently wearing.

No luck. Same thing with the other dressers and closet.

The pants were either in really girly colors, the legs were too tight, or was some cosplay costumes for characters from various books. The shorts were pretty much the same thing. You did find some shoes that were in your size, but for some reason, the high heels wouldn't budge from your feet. so you were stuck with them.

So you looked around and saw a window. since the door would lead to more dolls that would probably make out with you, the window would be safer. After unlocking the window, you climbed out of it.

Outside was the countryside with one or two houses in the far distance. you sighed and began to sneak away from the house.
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.title: escape Kelly's house

choices: Mellisa and Karen find a spell to break Sarah's
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.content:
As you made your way across the countryside, doing the best in high heels with high heels. You heard a car approaching, looking closely you noticed it was Sarah and Kelly. Freaking out, you rushed behind some bushes hoping they didn't see you. Looking through the gaps in the bushes as best as you could, their Chevy Yukon pulled up in Kelly's driveway, they didn't see you. As they walked towards the front door you noticed they were carrying bags of clothes in their hands.

"If you guys had plans on playing dress up with me, not happening." Laughing quietly. When they went through the front door and saw it close, you turned around and started moving more away from the house. "You lose Sarah, I'm getting out of here. I have to get back to Melissa and mom."

---

Walking back into the room where your My-Size Barbie box was. Sarah and Kelly were more than less pleased when they noticed you weren't tied in your box.

"What the fuck is going here, where is he?" Growled Sarah, obvious that she was pissed.

"I have no idea. Guards Christie, Midge! Get in here now!" Yelled Kelly.

"Yes mistresses, how may we serve you?" Said Christie as she and Midge entered the room.

"You may serve us by explaining where my brother is when he's supposed to be in that box. Where is he?" Asked Sarah irritated.

"Mistress we discovered that your brother somehow got out of his box. He tried to escape through the main entrance but Christie and I caught him. We decided to play with him for a little bit, but his ballerina outfit got dirty in the process, we dressed him in your clothes Mistress Kelly." Explained Midge nervously.

"You dressed him in MY clothes?! If you thought those clothes were old they're not, I just bought them!" Yelled Kelly.

"Mistress please, he's still here I guarantee you, we tied him up in Kelly's room." Said a nervous Christie as she and Midge ushered Sarah and Kelly to Kelly's bedroom. "He's right here tied to a chair, he's......oh shit."

Inside the bedroom was a chair with ropes, but no body tied to it. Christie and Midge but turned around in complete fear seeing Sarah with raging fire in his eyes.

"You idiots!! He's gone, you let him get away!!" Screamed Sarah grabbing Christie's arm. With that she threw her at Midge and they both collapsed breaking apart. The once former dolls were apparently really poor quality, explaining why they broke so easily.

"Sarah what do we do now? We don't know how long it's been since your brother escaped, he could be anywhere now. There's something else, since your mom knows magic very well, I'm positive she's heard of Amadeus Harkin as well. She could be searching for a counter spell when your brother and his girlfriend get together again eliminating her reverting back into a doll." Said Kelly as she looked at the broken dolls on the floor.

"That isn't good, her magic is stronger than mine and she's more experienced. I'm also guessing that my brother will soon find a solution to remove those fake boobs off his chest. It won't be much but I can make a spell to make his fake boobs real, then he'll really be stuck with them." Grinned Sarah as she cast a spell.

---

You were a few miles away from the house doing well, especially in high heels. That was until you felt a weight on your chest, you had gotten used to the fake boobs but these felt heavier. Stopping beside a tree, you took off your tank top and then your bra.

"Oh my god these are real." You said to yourself as you felt your boobs. To be honest they felt great, but you knew you had to keep looking as a girl in order to avoid any odd looks.

You fondled your boobs a bit more, until you noticed a few boys probably 10-11 years old. They were staring at you, your boobs mainly while trying to keep hidden. Only problem was they hid like idiots. Clearly embarrassed you folded your arms in front of your boobs. Since they were young you decided you could scare them off easily.

"Perverts! If I were you I'd leave right now before I decide to call all your moms and tell them you were spying on a girl changing her shirt." You threatened.

It worked, the boys ran away in fear clearly thinking their moms would be called. When you put your bra and tank top back on, you resumed keeping distance away from Kelly's house.
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.title: You managed to get out of distance of the house.

choices: Sarah and her brother settle differences
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.content:
Karen and Melissa continued to move through the old asylum. Many of the offices were either empty or blocked by broken walls and vegetation growing throughout the building. When they came across a office, they dug through some drawers and discovered another journal.

"Lets see if there's anything in this journal that can break my daughter's spell." Said Karen as she began going through the pages.

Dear diary, I am writing this today because Amadeus Harkin is getting more and more out of control. Last evening we had 3 patients in critical condition from massive blood loss. Instead of a normal blood transfusion which would've been routine, Amadeus claimed he could create a spell that would recreate blood with no need for a transfusion. While the spell did work, there was a big problem, all of the blood types for the patients were completely wrong. One passed away this morning while the other two patients conditions have gotten worse. Myself and a few other doctors do not know what to do, every experiment seems to be a failure. Amadeus is even claiming he can bring mannequins to life, that's absurd. Something must be done about this, it has to stop but we're too afraid to even approach him. Attached notes to this diary are spells to counter black magic. Amadeus thinks he is the only one who knows magic, but he is wrong, there are a few of us who do know some magic. Should anyone in the future have a friend or family trapped under black magic, may this journal help.

"Looks like we finally caught a break here, I can get my boyfriend back. Maybe even save Sarah too." Said Melissa happily.

"Yeah it does, lets start heading back to..." Karen said until she was cut off by some odd rumbling.

"What was that?" Said Melissa startled. She began to grow a little bit more nervous as she saw Karen pull a gun out from her jacket.

"You brought a gun?"

"Just in case for safety, keep quiet and stay behind me." Ordered Karen as she aimed her gun from where the noise came from. "Whoever is in here come out now! I am armed and I will shoot you if necessary to protect myself and my daughter."

From the darkness of the room where the noise came from, a man in torn clothing in his 30's cautiously stepped out. "Please don't shoot me, I'm being chased by dolls. The island appeared to look deserted, I'm just trying to hide. Can you help?"

---

In Kelly's house, Sarah and Kelly sat in the kitchen eating some lunch after cleaning up the broken dolls.

"Sarah can I ask you something?" Asked Kelly.

"Yeah I guess, what is it?" Said Kelly.

"Was it really necessary creating a spell to give your brother boobs? Do you want a sister?" Said Kelly curiously.

"No, I don't want a sister, I wanted to make sure by doing so he would be forced to keep dressing as a girl." Replied Sarah.

"Look Sarah I've been thinking, you wanted revenge on your brother for destroying your dolls which I understand. But look now, your brother never had a girlfriend in his life. Now he does, even though she used to be your mannequin and she transformed herself into human." Explained Kelly.

"I'm a little confused, what do you mean by all this, what is your point?" Asked Sarah.

"Let it go, let your brother have his happiness. I mean come on you had your fun, you got to see him dressed up, you had him tied up in a My-Size Barbie box. Why not help him instead, maybe sit down and talk it out with him. What do you think?" Said Kelly.

Sarah took a long sigh before coming with a response, "I'll think about it."
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.title: Mellisa and Karen/ spellbreaker?

choices: Melissa and Karen leave the stranger to his fate
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.content:
"I guess... What dolls are after you?" Karen asked.

The stranger sighed in relief as he leaned against the wall. He took a few deep breaths before he answered, "Yknow those Barbie dolls?"

"Oh, so you brought them to life." Karen asked as Melissa slowly began to hide behind her.

The stranger shook his head before he said, "No, I wish I did though. Barbie seems much nicer. Y'see, I decided to be a bit of a pervert and bring to life some Bild Lilli dolls I bought. Things seemed nice... at first."

Both Karen and Melissa sighed in disappointment as they thought, 'Another man thinking with his dick and messing with things he shouldn't have.'

"The sex was pretty good... Then they wanted more and more, they even began to use magic to try and make me into a nearly mindless sexual dynamo! If it weren't for the journal I found here that brought them to life, I might not have been able to dispel their powers on me..."

Karen sighed again before giving the man a glare before she said, "Look, just stop explaining what happened and I might help you."

"You said-" The stranger said in disbelief.

"That was before I learned what you did." Karen said, her glare getting worse.

"Leave him to us and we'll let you leave unmolested," A cold voice said before behind Melissa.

"Oh shit..." The stranger said as Karen and Melissa turned around.

At the doorway was a number of human-sized Lilli dolls. Some where a bit shorter than Karen and some were a head taller. Where Melissa radiated 'Girl next door' because of her Barbie heritage, the Lilli dolls had the 'Femme fatale' aura. Each of the Lilli dolls studied Karen and Melissa with half-lidded eyes.

"How fast can you disable them?" Karen whispered.

"Only the ones we see at the moment, which might not be even that many. We might be completely surrounded," Melissa whispered back.

The stranger looked at Karen and Melissa with pleading, begging eyes.
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.title: Karen/Melissa help the mysterious stranger?

1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.content:
The Lilli dolls slowly moved closer towards them, more towards the stranger. Melissa scanned the room as quick as she could, there appeared to be 10-12 Lilli dolls, and a broken window.

"You a good shot with that gun?" Whispered Melissa to Karen.

"Had a brother who was in the army and taught me to shoot, so yeah, why?" Karen whispered back.

"Just follow my lead and try to keep any away from me." Melissa smiled as she made a head gesture towards the broken window.

"Here catch!!" Yelled Melissa as she threw the journal at the nearest Lilli doll.

It caught the journal thrown off guard, unaware that Melissa ran towards her and was kicked hard square in the chest. Broken plastic crumbled on another doll as the 1st was kicked flying backwards knocking over a few. Now feeling threatened, the other dolls charged towards Melissa ready to attack her. One grabbed her shoulders but Melissa simply backed up smashing the doll against a broken door. Things had gotten dangerous though when a few others began to attack with broken pieces of pipe, and old surgery equipment. Before Melissa could even be touched, Karen responded firing rounds from her pistol stopping the insane dolls.

The stranger lay on the ground cowering in fear from all the violence happening. Karen grabbed him by the arm and pulled him up roughly, irritated she had to babysit a grown man.

"Get up now before I change my mind about saving you!" Growled Karen as she picked up the journal as well. "Melissa come on we have to leave now!"

When the last Lilli doll failed to do any harm, Melissa picked up the broken body and threw it at the window shattering it. Now they had an escape route. All 3 climbed out of the window, only to find more Lilli dolls running in their direction.

"Lets go, the boat is in this direction!" Karen yelled as they turned around to reach the boat.

They reached the boat, appearing to be faster than the dolls, but still not out of the woods yet.

"Melissa start the engine hurry! And you, make yourself useful and untie the boat!" Ordered Karen as she fired rounds towards the Lilli dolls hoping to throw them off balance.

The engine was started and the boat untied, they managed to get off shore and into deeper waters just barely. Looking back at the shore was rather scary now. It was filled with hundreds of Lilli dolls. After driving for five minutes and out of sight of the island, they slowed the boat to it's idle speed and sighed in relief.

"Oh my god, I can't thank you enough, I thought I was gonna..." The stranger began to thank Melissa and Karen.

"Shut up already, we just stuck our necks out there for you! And now you have to help us." Glared Karen cutting him off.

"Wh-What do you mean?" The Stranger asked confused.

"You brought those dolls to life with magic, now there's Barbie dolls brought to life and they have my son. And thanks to your magic that you used my daughter is corrupted. She doesn't know this magic is dangerous." Said Karen.

"You have a son, a daughter? Wait a minute I thought you said that's your daughter who just killed 10 dolls like it was nothing." Replied the Stranger confused. "Why should I care about your son, he's probably having the time of his life getting laid by Barbie.."

"That's my boyfriend you're talking about jerk! Oh and by the way, I'm her adopted daughter in a sense. Now are you going to help us, or are we going to send you back to the island for your toys to have their way with you?" Threatened Melissa.
1452111122111121211221222212111211121221.title: They decided to fight.

1452111122111121212.content:
As soon as you heard the door to Sarah's closet shut, you immediately struggled to break free from your bonds. It was useless though, the Barbies had your hands/arms/shoulders/legs/ankles and chest tied to the board tightly. Not onlyie were the zip ties really strong, the ends of them were connected to the back of the board, way out of your reach.

After 5 or 10 minutes had passed, you gave up admitting to yourself that you weren't going to get free. You were tired, having been woken up in the middle of the night finding yourself tied up, and now turned into your sisters new dress up doll. Before falling asleep you wondered what would lay in the future.

1 hour had passed when you heard really strong wind in the house, almost like a hurricane. But there were no hurricanes where you lived, it was Sarah returning home. She ran upstairs, opened the her door and walked in slowly behind your box until coming into view.

"Well well well, don't you look pretty little brother? That dress is very cute on you" Sarah teased. She smiled evilly at you approving the hard work the dolls had done. Immediately she snapped her finger signalling the Barbies to come out. While the smaller ones filed in, the Mannequin stood next to your box.

"You have all done very well, he looks so pretty! How did it go, any resisting, complaining?" Sarah asked the Barbie Mannequin. You tried shouting at Sarah while thrashing against your bonds. However all that came out were muffled noises.

"Resistance was very little, there was no way he could escape. Although through the course of getting him prepared, I had no choice but to gag him," The Barbie Mannequin explained.

Curious as to how you were gagged, Sarah opened the front part of your box. She spoke a small spell, one you had no idea what it was, only to realize your lips were no longer glued. "Open your mouth little brother but do not try anything stupid," Sarah warned.

You slowly opened your mouth cooperating, revealing the Mannequin's panties stuffed in your mouth. Sarah laughed enjoying your gag. "Very clever, he needs to learn to keep his mouth shut. Re-glue his lips," Sarah ordered.

You felt the Mannequin put the glue on your lips again, later forcing them shut. Sarah closed back up the front part of your box, re-sealing it with tape.

"Lets leave him there for a few hours, let him feel what it's like to be a doll in a box. Keep an eye on him, I'm going to get cleaned up. Afterwards we can play a little dress up. And maybe later get him some feminine supplies of his own!" Sarah giggled walking behind a divider in her room.
1452111122111121212.title: An hour later, Sarah teleported in.

14521111221111212122.content:
You couldn't do anything the position you were in, you watched Sarah turn on the lights in her bathroom connected to her room. She walked in and turned on her shower and then stepped back out behind her room divider while the water got warm. As Sarah undressed, draping her shirt and bra over the divider, you got embarrassed. Unsure why though, the bra and panties the dolls dressed you in probably belonged to Sarah.

After she finished undressing she walked into her bathroom shutting the door behind her and began her shower. You were in a prison. Sarah's the warden and the Barbie mannequin is her captain. Before she undressed she mentioned feminine supplies. What did she mean you thought?

"She means having you wear tampons and pads," The Barbie explained hearing your thoughts. "We can't have your panties get dirty can we?"

Oh god she can't be serious. Tampons, pads? The clothes and makeup are bad enough. She can't be serious.

"Oh but I am brother," Said Sarah coming out of the bathroom. She had a bathrobe on and her hair wrapped in a towel. In one of her hands she held a box of tampons and pads. "Now what should we have you use"
14521111221111212122.title: Something else

145211112211112121222.content:
You motioned your head towards the pads.

Sarah smiled as she put down the tampon box and snapped her fingers.

All of a sudden, you, the clothes you were forced into, and the box all began to grow until you reached your normal height. She then gave the box to one of the Barbies.

"Put one in their panties, Melissa," Sarah said before she walked over to her bed, picked up a book, and began to read it. "I have a big spell to prepare."

"Yes, Mistress," Melissa said with a salute. The plastic barrier somehow moved away, allowing her to pull up your dress, pull down your panties, and carefully place a pad before pulling it back up. It felt... Weird. Like wearing a diaper.

"Like it, Bro?" Sarah asked as she snapped her finger while still reading her book. The tape on your mouth vanished, but a pink necklace with a plastic metal with Barbie's face on it appeared. Melissa took the Barbie mannequin's panties from your mouth.

Before you could speak, the Barbie medallion glowed. Instead of yelling implants, your mouth and voice said in a voice eerily similar to Sarah's own, "A bit odd, but I'm glad you did it, sis!"

Looking away from her book, Sarah enjoyed your look of horror, Sarah said, "As long as that necklace is on you, I and my dolls can control your body like... Well, a doll."

She went back to reading as she then said, "So play nice or I'll cast a spell that'll have everyone but me, you, and my dolls retro-actively thinking you like to crossdress."
145211112211112121222.title: Sister's new doll... or faux-sister?

choices: Your sister's barbies, walking towards you
a human sized Barbie, who admitted she stole your size
No one..., but you kept hearing the voice
1452113.content:
As you woke up you wondered why you were completely naked. When you tired to get off the bed, you were surprised by the fact that your legs met with more of the bed.

You rubbed your eyes and woke up more. When you uncovered your eyes, you said, "Either I shrank or my room got a lot bigger."

Looking around, you saw nothing out of the usual, save for the size difference.

So you walked over to the side of the bed and used a blanket to climb down.

Once on the ground, you looked around for something. Maybe a weapon or a piece of cloth. To your luck, you saw a soft cloth that you used to clean your smartphone screen. As you tied it around yourself as a toga, you used your surroundings to judge your size and managed to guesstimate it.

Around a doll size or so. if a Barbie was the size of an adult, your head was around her breast level, if not smaller.

You sighed, "Let's see what phone I can get to... My own phone's ... way too high to get..."

You looked up at your bedstand, where your phone was on top. So you headed to the living room, where the home phone was.

As you made your way, you kept looking around. At one point, you said to yourself, "Man, this is kind of weird, but neat..."

A giggly-girly voice said, "Thanks!"

You turned around and saw....
1452113.title: Curse of an older sister - alone and Doll sized

14521131.content:
As if the things you had just gone through weren't enough, your sister's own Barbie collection was behind you! What would normally be about 5 feet seemed much further from your small perspective.

The group was about 10 Barbies. One wore a doctor's uniform, another in a swimsuit, and various other dresses and cloths made up the Barbie collection. Though you knew that your sister had more. The group walked together toward you, and indeed, you were much shorter than them.

The Barbie in the fashion dress put a hand to her hip, fingers to her chin, eyeing your appearance. You stood in awe at the situation. She quickly shook her head after a minute or two before walking up to you, ripping off the makeshift toga you made.

"That dress looks absolutely terrible on you!" She said, as you stepped back nervously. The other Barbie dolls surrounding you. Having to look up at them made you feel so small and helpless...

Your eyes widened as another Barbie spoke.

"I agree! Let's give him a makeover!"

"Makeover!" The other Barbies giggled. You quickly tried to run through the horde of Barbies, but you were quickly grabbed and subdued by the others. You thrashed around as another Barbie brought out some yarn.

"No! Stop!" you shouted, "I don't want a makeover!" You tried to tell them as the Barbies quickly tied you up. Your small size making it harder to tear through the yarn.

"But you'll look so much better!" one of the Barbies said as she grabbed your thrashing legs, another lifting you by the arms. The group of dolls began walking toward your sister's room, chanting, "Makeover!" in unison. You struggled harder, to no avail.

Since it had a lot more of them than you expected a mall to have, you wondered if the mall's owners made a deal with the devil or something, just so that the mall's owners could always have a place to get new clothes from.

Little did you know, you were right. The owner did want to both always have a place to get new clothes, but also wanted to be famous for it as well. The ambient magic energy created by the deal was waiting for something to set it off.

And today, you were going to be responsible for it one way or another.

On your way to work, you...

14531111.content:
You are named Alex. You are a guy that is working in a mall that has a larger than normal amount of women's clothing stores. Each of the stores also uses a lot of mannequins to model the various clothes.

Your job is pretty much janitoral, but whatever else that needs help. There was a few other people, but not many.

On your way to work, you helped a rather MILFy woman that kinda looked a bit like a Gypsy. She said she would reward you and mumbled some words.

Little did you know, it was a curse that would make any woman have a stronger urge to dominate you like a slave/toy. The Gypsy woman realized that after you left her sight. So she started to look around for you to try to remove it from you.

Somehow, the curse was starting to animate the Mannequins in the Mall. Because they had no life or desire before, their sole goal in life was to dominate you and have fun with you. There was enough energy from the deal with the devil that the Mall's owners made for it to do so.

So while you were making sure that nothing was out of place in a Lingerie store, you thought you heard footsteps. Whenever you heard something, you looked back. You saw no one each time.

Then you thought you heard a mass of quiet footsteps.

You saw that the mannequins were out of place and were in a line, kinda like this.

http://www.flickr.com/photos/theenmoy/90...

Needless to say, you started to get creeped out.

145311111.content:
Although the lined up mannequins creep you out alot you still have a job to do, so you walk away from the display to go work somewhere else in the mall. You try and think of a store that isn't very creepy to try and calm yourself, you settle on...

Store 1: One of the larger stores, it sells beds, bedsheets, quilts, pillows and other bedroom accessories, to bad you forgot about the mannequins modeling pajamas and robes in the back of the store.

145311111.title: You stay and try to keep working

choices: Yes, they'd still be able to move
No, they can only move when no one is looking at them.
1453111111.content:
You headed to the store that sold blankets, pillows and pretty much anything for the bedroom that didn't involve sex.

145311221.title: mannequin protagonist #1

1453112212.content:
There is a mannequin named Rosanne that has been around for at least a week in the mall. There are some powers Rosanne have that could be used to her needs. She can feel like an actual person with a breath of life flowing through her. There is also the ability to affect other non-human objects around her. Affecting humanly objects would be too mean and weird, so Rosanne limits herself.

With these abilities, she set out to explore the mall and have fun while the security guards know little of her actions. Sometimes, Rose help them out in secret without them knowing what she can do. Other times, the lively mannequin would go and swap heads with other mannequins and dolls just to test out the clothes and see which clothes, poses, and items should be presented better to convince people to buy things. This has been the life she has set up for herself as Rose stayed in the mall.

As she stays there, Rose realizes that there is a doll who isn't like her in the warehouse. It is a Trixie doll, a small-sized young woman with a pigtail bun hairstyle and strange dress made to look like she would be for a party. She is made of cloth and thread. A doll like this is always supposed to bring joy and excitement to the hearts of many people. The doll was in the store before while she had her fun exploring until today. For some reason, it has been hidden away in storage without it being present. This doll appears to have deep hatred within. Using her powers, Rose decide to bring them to life.

When brought to life, Trixie doesn't appear to be as cheerful and happy as she was thought to be. Instead, she appears gloomy and sad, feeling that no one will ever buy her and take her in. Rose isn't sure of what to do with this situation, so she instead plans to takes Trixie out and explores the mall. There are places that Rose is sure Trixie will like to see, even if Trixie has been there before. Carrying Trixie in her arms, Rose looks at Trixie.

Rose looks at Trixie and begins hugging her tightly "Don't worry, you're alive now because of me."

"Why did you do that? Why make me like this" Trixie asks.

"Because I care about you, silly. You're not going to rot away here" Rose answers.

Trixie gives an unpleasant look, as though she didn't ask for this. "Oh, how nice of you."

"You see, I'm a magical mannequin, able to do nearly anything I want" Rose proclaims. She smiles while telling Trixie this.

"Swell. You must sure have a lot of fun." Trixie doesn't get amused by this. For one thing, Trixie wants to have fun, not be stuck with feeling inferior to everyone else.

"Oh come now, dear. You can express yourself to me" Rose persists.

Trixie replies "I don't feel like it. Just turn me back and leave me alone."

"But I don't want to. You have this chance now, this golden opportunity to do what you want. You don't have to be so glum." Rose is concerned over Trixie's well-being. "In fact, I can make you into a pretty princess. Maybe then some girl will pick you."

"I don't like you" Trixie states. She becomes irritated over the fact that Rose

"You're not a goth. Just accept my offer and everything will be alright. I'm here to make things right." Rose declares.

Trixie becomes irritated by this woman's persistence. To think she has never met someone this annoying until now. "Just leave me alone!"

At that moment, Trixie slaps Rose across the face, sending her head flying from her body. The body she has turns into a mannequin while her head stays animated and lively. Trixie looks at what she has done. She just slapped a mannequin and the power she wielded just made her body become inanimate. Trixie looks over to Rose's head and sees her squirming. She then realizes something. Trixie becomes slightly shocked, yet realizes that she was capable of doing something like this.

"You know what, you don't deserve your power" Trixie says to the bodyless Rose. She climbs over to Rose's neck and looks into it. There is nothing there. Somehow, this Rose person was able to animate Trixie and make her become lively. "So I can have this power, huh." Pondering over her choice between staying in the warehouse and experiencing a new world in the mall, she makes a decision. Channeling her desires, Trixie changes instantly. One moment, Trixie's head is on her body, and the next she is on Rose's body. Not only that, but Rose's head has been placed on Trixie's small cloth-like body. Trixie's head becomes realistic as she is on the new body. "I can't believe it" is all Trixie could say.

Rose is in shock over the events that just happened. To think something like this would occur. What's worse is that she feels drained of most of her powers. The person who harbors much of what she had is Trixie.
1453112212.title: Exchanged Views

14531122121.content:
Rosanne is in shock at the situation at hand. Right now, she has the body of the Trixie doll she was speaking to. This has been an unexpected turn of events.

Looking at herself, Rosanne realizes that she is in a powerless state. Being a doll is weird to her, especially in a small size compared to her normal body.

With the powers that she now has, Trixie realizes that she now has been bestowed with strange abilities, one she has never experienced until Rose started bringing her to life. Now animated and having Rose's body, Trixie feels weird.

Looking at her hands, Trixie is in awe at the strangeness. She feels a tingly and almost weird sensation. "Now I have your body, and these powers." Trixie says as she tries to move around in the new body. She feels that she has gotten the hang of it. "Might as well use them anyway."

Rose can't believe what she's hearing. "You can't do this to me! That's my body you're in!"

Trixie looks at Rose, seeing her act weird. She has gotten so annoyed by Rose, that it's starting to irritate her. "I'm gonna have to put you away for a while. You're just crazy."

Rose doesn't understand. How can she be crazy? "Even though I restored you to life!? I was the one who wanted you to experience the world out there!"

"You're so annoying. To think I would've had to put up with your craziness." Trixie then puts her hands to her hips. She then walks over to Rose and picks her up. Picking her up, the walk together through the warehouse.

Rose gets scared. "Where are you taking me? I demand an answer!" Trixie doesn't answer her as she continues searching the area.

Trixie the stops before something on one of the shelves. She raises her hand and points to it. "See this box? I'm gonna put you in it."

"Oh no you don't!" Rose tries to plead for her life. She doesn't want to be put in something.

Trixie doesn't care. "Yeah, see, you're going in it." Trixie then brings her closer to the box. Rose continues pleading, unsure of what might happen. "In you go." Trixie says as she puts her inside and closes the lid ."And out of my life." She can hear Rose scream as she walks away. Rose wants to get out of the box, but Trixie ignores her. Instead, now that she has this opportunity, Trixie heads out of the warehouse and leaves Rose to her fate.

In order to restore everything back, Rose tries to get out of the box with the mitten hands she has. For her, it's hard to get a good grip of things without any fingers. She could've clawed out if she was in her own body, then again, she wouldn't know where to claw and if it wasn't the ground.

Doing her best with what little she has, Rose gets out of the box, falling out of the shelf and hitting the ground. In pain, Rose tries her best to collect herself. Right now, she has to find Trixie.

Working out her new feet, Rose heads off to the exit in order to get back to the mall. In order to restore everything back, she has to find Trixie and reverse this strange spell. Rose doesn't want to spend her life being a strange doll that someone just tossed away.

No matter what, she can't let Trixie abuse her powers. Who knows what kind of trouble that strange doll might cause in the ordinary mall.

She soon stops before some doors that have been closed off. They lead back inside the mall when she came in here. Getting irritated, Rose pushes the doors, hoping to get it all over with.

Walking out of the warehouse, Rose continues motivating herself to find out where Trixie is. She knows that Trixie can be dangerous with her powers, but it might be restored to Rose when she gets it.
145311221211.title: some time passes...

1453112212111.content:
As she walks around, she sees that everything has gotten darker than usual. Nearly all the lights have been closed, with only the ceiling windows having the moonlight shine through them. Will all this darkness around, Rose can't help but question just how long she has been stuck inside that box?

All of this was scary for her. She never really roamed the mall without at least several lights on. It's too dark to do anything, so why not have some lights on? Sure, that could potentially attracted some people to inspect on what's going on, but Rose would rather know where she is and what she is around then be surrounded by complete darkness.

Feeling unsure about where she is, Rose stands still, frightened of everything that's going on. What's going on? Who is there? Just what might be popping around the corner and hidden in the shadows? Is there going to be something that might kidnap her now that she doesn't have her powers? With each question coming up within her mind, Rose doesn't know what to do.

Each of these questions needs an answer, but Rose doesn't know what to do now that she doesn't have the powers that she normally had. She doesn't want to die or anything. There's so much to life that she hasn't truly experienced after all.

Fearing what might happen due to her being stuck being a small and somewhat pudgy doll, Rose thinks about the present danger. She might get attacked or kidnapped or even lost in this giant mall. Nothing would be a safe option for her as the darkness surrounds Rose.

With everything being a present danger, Rose notices something...
1453112212111.title: Trixie makes an appearance

A soft chuckle is heard in the darkness, confusing Rose. She looks around, hoping to figure out what that noise is. "Well hello there, Rosy. I guess you finally got out of that box" The tone is soft, feminine, and awkwardly calm. It seems that the person appears to know what has gone on in the mall.

Strange enough, Rose knows this voice for some reason. It's familiar in a way, but she figures out who it is that is talking.

The person talking to her is Trixie, yet it doesn't sound like her usual bored tone. For some reason, Rose can pick up a sense of mischief in her voice. It's as though the person who showed no interest in what she had to offer had changed.

Rose is in shock. She doesn't understand what is going on. "T-Trixie? I-is that you?" Rose asked nervously.

Trixie begins chuckling again, recognizing Rose's confusion. "Why sure it is, Rosy. Don't you recognize my voice? Dear god, what happened with you while you were in that box?"

"H-how long was I in there"

"M-my body! W-what did you do to my body?" Rose can't begin to understand the strange changes made while Trixie was in her body.

Trixie notices this and places her hands on her hips. She smirks at Rose and looks down at herself. "This body? I just tuned it to my liking. After all, with these powers, I might as well have a little fun. Gotta goof off and do what ya wanna do, ya know."

info.brief_description: what if dolls, mannequins and gynoids decided they were going to 'play' with their owners?
info.description:
What if inanimate girl dolls (like Barbie or various homages/ripoffs/parodies of her) and mannequins were suddenly were able to move on their own, think on their own, and decided that they were going to be the masters? What if Gynoids suddenly decided that they wanted to be in command?

Things to keep in mind -
This will primarily be a femdom story where the female dolls, mannequins, and gynoids are in control. Regular sized people can temporarily take control, but it will always be temporary.

If you want to differentiate multiples of the same dolls into different ones, feel free to add a number or a letter after their name. Example: Barbie-12 or Barbie-H.

As for mannequins of either real people or fictional characters, put an M! or an emoticon in front of their name. Example: M!Jessica, M!Nami, M!Sarah,-Jessica, -Nami, or -Sarah

The emoticon thing was suggested by FlashWally22. They used it in a chapter, we talked about it, and so it's now accepted.

EDIT On JUNE 6, 2018 : If you require more options in a chapter, let me know. I can add 2 more options.

What's allowed -

Body expansion
inflation
Weight gain (but not too fast)
Sex (please lead up to it.)
Shrinking is allowed as long as it doesn't lead to death or overly cruel femdom.

What's not allowed -

Scat
graphic violence
Ending chapters (There will be an exception if you add a possible continuation option if you do want to end a chapter)
Really cruel femdom
Anyone below the age of 16 if sex or anything related to sex occurs. AGE THEM UP FIRST! But if the plot calls for it, you may de-age the bodies of male characters to about 11 or so, as long as their minds remain mostly unaffected.

What's on the fence that you need to contact me about before adding it in a chapter or put up a warning in the title-

incest (put up a warning, like adding (W!) in the title)

Transgender or genderchange (Put a (TG!) in the title or I will delete the chapter!)
